item.value: \tstatic final int FUNC_CALL_NUMBER = 15\R\t/\*\*\R\t \* used to know wich ones of the function are used, and need to be implemented in the compiled program \R\t \*/\R\tstatic Set<String> isFuncCalled = new HashSet<String>\(FUNC_CALL_NUMBER\)\R\t\R\tstatic int context=0;\R\t\R\tdef<T> T pop\(EList<T> l\) \{\R\t\tif \(l\.size > 0\) \{\R\t\t\tval tmp = l\.get\(0\)\R\t\t\tl\.remove\(0\)\R\t\t\ttmp\R\t\t\} else \R\t\t\tnull\R\t\}\R\t\R\tdef String neutralized\(String s\) \{\R\t\ts\.toCharArray\.fold\("", \[f, c \| f \+ \(c=='\\\\'\? "\\\\\\\\":c\)\]\)\R\t\}\R\t\R\t\R\t\R\tdef String evalExpr\(Expression e\) \{\R\t\tcontext \+\+\R\t\tval i = switch e\.class \{\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof FuncCall :\R\t\t\t\t\t"\$\(" \+ evalFuncCall\(e as FuncCall\) \+ "\)"\R\t\t\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof Assign :\R\t\t\t\t\t"let \\"" \+ \(e as Assign\)\.\^var \+ "=" \+ evalExpr\(\(e as Assign\)\.\^val\) \+ '\\"'\R\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof LogicalExpression:\R\t\t\t\t\t"\$\(\(" \+ evalMath\(e as LogicalExpression\) \+ "\)\)"\R\t\t\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof Nop :\R\t\t\t\t\t'!' \+ evalExpr\(\(e as Nop\)\.expr\)\R\t\t\}\R\t\tcontext --\R\t\ti \+ \(context == 0 \? "\\n": ""\)\R\t\}\R\t\t\R\tdef String evalMath\(LogicalExpression e\) \{\R\t\te\.right\.fold\(evalMath\(e\.left\), \[s, x \| s \+ e\.op\.pop \+ evalMath\(x\)\]\)\R\t\}\R\t\R\tdef String evalMath\(CompExpression e\) \{\R\t\te\.right\.fold\(evalMath\(e\.left\), \[s, x \| s \+ e\.op\.pop \+ evalMath\(x\)\]\)\R\t\}\R\t\R\tdef String evalMath\(ArithExpression e\) \{\R\t\te\.right\.fold\(evalMath\(e\.left\), \[s, x \| s \+ e\.op\.pop \+ evalMath\(x\)\]\)\R\t\}\R\t\R\tdef String evalMath\(SubExpression e\) \{\R\t\te\.right\.fold\(evalMath\(e\.left\), \[s, x \| s \+ e\.op\.pop \+ evalMath\(x\)\]\)\R\t\}\R\t\R\tdef String evalMath\(BaseExpression e\) \{\R\t\t//TODO\R\t\tswitch e\.class \{\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof Var : \R\t\t\t\t"\$"\+\(e as Var\)\.\^var\R\t\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof Parenthesis : \R\t\t\t\t'\(' \+ \(e as Parenthesis\)\.expr\.evalExpr \+ '\)'\R\t\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof ConstStr : \R\t\t\t\t\(e as ConstStr\)\.constStr\R\t\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof ConstNat : \R\t\t\t\tString\.valueOf\(\(e as ConstNat\)\.constNat\)\R\t\t\t\t\R\t\t\tcase e instanceof ConstVector : \R\t\t\t\t"\( " \+ \(e as ConstVector\)\.constVector\R\t\t\t\t\.fold\("", \[ s, x \| s \+ "\\", \\"" \+ x\.evalExpr\]\)\R\t\t\t\t\+ "\\" \)"\R\t\t\}\R\t\}\R
